reviewText: Richard Amos' style is clear and easy to follow.  I can't think of any way he could improve upon his style, nor can I think of any better way to teach any of the martial arts.  Great job!

I have purchased all 4 of the volumes and have been very pleased with the videos.  My entire family has enjoyed practicing at home with them. They are beautifully done and wonderful in their content.  I would recommend them to anyone practicing Shotokan or to anyone thinking about starting.  They are all well worth the money.
This instruction in traditional karate is excellent.  If you are a Shotokan student then you should have these DVDs in your library.
